# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x413e6A62483Dd278a8dBa9b9B0bD6d87B5e01062`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0xb930fbb3ea56a558a0c2264ee63961aac492ba7e2ce47ebac6c4d5bd709d3da5",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x2617995d34ca80f9680f48ca7c3f36f3a76bafe4c67e40c1373e89ff79c23a8e",
        "r": "0xc975f9b787d0095c8daba286d79c1e032fe3b87204008647681ddc54097a8e8b",
        "v": 27
      }

      "hash": "0x3d41007e912ba4693f62ecb8373aad29b2dfa67a649846d57bb4b399fd61ed6a",
```

### Step 2
#### Contract

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

### Step 3
#### Contract

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
